body.name: Turmeric Kojic Cleansing Pads, Gentle Cleanser for All Skin Types, Fights Acne, Dark Inner Thighs, Uneven Skin Tone, Reduces Dark Spots & Fades Scars Face & Body Cleanser (15 ct)
features: BRIGHTENING: Experience the magic of Turmeric and the brightening wonders of Kojic Acid with our Turmeric & Kojic Acid Infused Foaming Exfoliating Pads. Banish acne, fade dark spots, and relish silky-smooth skin. Unlock the power of these premium ingredients for your best complexion ever.

EXFOLIATING: Turmeric Brightening Exfoliating Cleansing Pads are formulated with a carefully curated selection of skin-loving ingredients to provide you with the ultimate skincare experience. Use to cleanse, exfoliate and brighten your skin in 1 step.

EFFECTIVE INGREDIENTS: Turmeric is a natural wonder ingredient great properties. It helps even the skin, reduce the appearance of dark spots, and promote a more even skin tone. Kojic acid is known for its skin-brightening capabilities. It helps to reduce the appearance of age spots, sun damage resulting in a more radiant complexion.
Ingredients: Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Aloe Vera Juice, Glycerin, Turmeric, Kojic Acid, Salycylic Acid, Vitamin C, Ylang Ylang Essential Oil, Phenoxyethanol.
HOW TO USE: Using warm water, massage the pads onto skin in circular motion, leave on for 1-2 mins. Rinse off. Follow up with a moisturizer and SPF

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to see the affects but these pads are just cleansing pads not exfoliant on them.They also tear easy. I'm going to continue to use them..it's a good face cleaner on a pad .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works so well on dark marks. I used this for 3 weeks and noticed a difference.
